<template lang="pug">
    header.header
        .wrapper
            .header__inner
                router-link(to="/").header__logo
                    img(src="@/assets/img/logo.svg")
                ul.header__list
                    li.header__item
                        router-link(to="").header__link Awards
                    li.header__item
                        router-link(to="").header__link Applications
                    li.header__item
                        router-link(to="").header__link About
                .langs
                    .langs__value EN
                    .langs__dropdown
                        .langs__items
                            button.langs__item EN
                            button.langs__item RU
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'block-header',
    data: function(){
        return {}
    }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
    .header {
        width: 100%;
        position: fixed;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        padding: 25px 0;

        &__inner {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            height: 48px;
        }

        &__list {
            display: flex;

            & > * {
                &:not(:last-child) {
                    margin-right: 37px;
                }
            }
        }

        &__item {
            text-transform: uppercase;
            font-size: 12px;
            line-height: 19px;
            text-align: center;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
            color: #37393E;
            position: relative;

            &:after {
                content: '';
                position: absolute;
                top: 50%;
                transform: translateY(-50%);
                right: -20px;
                width: 1px;
                height: 14px;
                background: rgba(190, 203, 217, 0.4);
            }
        }
    }

    .langs {
        width: 48px;
        height: 48px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: #F7FAFF;
        box-shadow: 6px 3px 10px rgba(197, 197, 216, 0.19);
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        position: relative;

            &:hover {

                .langs__dropdown {
                    height: 80px;
                }

                .langs__item {
                    opacity: 1;
                    transition: opacity .3s ease .2s;
                }
            }

            &__value {
                line-height: 48px;
                cursor: pointer;
            }

            &__dropdown {
                position: absolute;
                height: 0px;
                width: 48px;
                top: 30px;
                left: -1px;
                text-align: center;
                background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
                border: 1px solid rgba(240, 240, 240, 0.58);
                border-top: none;
                border-radius: 0 0 30px 30px;
                overflow: hidden;
                z-index: -1;
                transform-origin: top;
                transition: height .5s ease;
            }

            &__items {
                position: relative;
                padding-top: 25px;
            }

            &__item {
                display: block;
                width: 100%;
                margin-bottom: 10px;
                font-weight: 700;
                font-size: 11px;
                text-transform: uppercase;
                color: #818181;
                transition: opacity .5s ease;
                opacity: 0;
                
                &:hover {
                    color: #363636;
                }
            }
    }
</style>
